1. Not enough Stamina.
2. When Inventory is full

Will you begin Repeat Battle?

Repeat Battle will end under the following conditions:
1. If the Room Master does not have enough entries.
2. If the Inventory of the Room Master or Party members is full.
3. If the Room Master or Party member leaves the room.
4. If the Room Master ends Repeat Battle.
Do you want to begin Repeat Battle?
